metadata.title: CVE-2022-2961 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s PLP Rosefunctionality in the way a user triggers a race condition by calling bindwhile simultaneously triggering the rose_bind() function. This flaw allowsa local user to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on thesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needs-triage').
